-1.title: NY Comic Con 2009 Brimstone Interview
-1.plot: "Longshot" Ken of The Loud Idiots finally gets up an up-close and personal with pro-wrestling fan favorite and "honorary" Loud Idiot Brimstone. We get candid about his career, new comic book "Brimstone and the Borderhounds", and why you don't want to piss this man off.

imdb.plot outline: The Loud Idiots are a collective of internet-based pop-culture focused performers, radio shows, podcasters, and bloggers - based out of NJ and dedicated to producing high-quality lifestyle entertainment for the coveted 18-34 demographic, and the company's flagship brands have been followed closely by fans since 1996. From gaming, comics, and movie reviews, to original comedy, music, and genre fiction, NonPro is Geek Chic done right.
imdb.title: Loud Idiots
plot: The _Loud Idiots_ (qv) are a collective of internet-based pop-culture focused performers, radio shows, podcasters, and bloggers - based out of NJ and dedicated to producing high-quality lifestyle entertainment for the coveted 18-34 demographic, and the company's flagship brands have been followed closely by fans since 1996. From gaming, comics, and movie reviews, to original comedy, music, and genre fiction, NonPro is Geek Chic done right.
